name: OA Family
description:
OA Family, a game with learning and relaxation. The main system of the game is to bring the popular English vocabulary game Hangman to do in a player-friendly format with a helper. There are cute images suitable for all ages.



There are several help buttons to increase the fun and challenge.



Win the game to receive multiple random boxes for a chance to win special prizes.


The game also has an item collection and adventure system.
- Crafting system
- Weapon upgrade
- Cooking
- Fishing
and other systems that will be updated for players to enjoy it.


And most importantly, we will donate 20% of our income without deducting expenses to children's charities in Thailand.
